name: wid5_F2F3_module15
label: F2F 3: parents on child (CASI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: competence rating of social skills, oral skills, concentration ability, communications skills, mathematic ability, general knowledge; cultural capital: reading, classical music, cultural discussion, cultural participation; current subjective health; desired school-leaving qualification; diagnoses (adults and children); doctor's visit; expected probability to attain a degree; heigth, weight, bmi; impairment caused by diseases; occurence of externalising problem behavior (e.g. being restless and easily distracted, having tantrums, lying and cheating); occurence of internalising problem behavior (e.g. headaches and nausea, nervousness, and being easily scared); self esteem; type of education / training; current status of education / qualification.

cul0100t.label: How much time does <CHILD'S NAME> spend reading each day, on average? All possible types of text should be recorded here (including the Internet, e-mails, etc.) If your child reads more on school-free days than on school days, please state the average reading time.
cul0100t.label_de: Wie viel Zeit verbringt <NAMES DES KINDES> im Durchschnitt taeglich damit, in der Freizeit zu lesen? Hier sollen alle moeglichen Textsorten erfasst werden (auch Internet, Emails, etc.). Wenn an schulfreien Tagen mehr gelesen wird als an Schultagen bitte die durchschnittliche Lesedauer angeben.

items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . completes tasks; good concentration span.
items.text_de: . . . fuehrt Aufgaben zu Ende; gute Konzentrationsspanne.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . often has temper tantrums; is quick-tempered.
items.text_de: . . . hat oft Wutanfaelle; ist aufbrausend.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . is generally obedient, usually does what adults request.
items.text_de: . . . ist im Allgemeinen folgsam; macht meist, was Erwachsene verlangen.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . often quarrels with other children or bullies them.
items.text_de: . . . streitet sich oft mit anderen Kindern oder schikaniert sie.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . often lies or cheats.
items.text_de: . . . luegt oder mogelt haeufig.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . steals from home, school or elsewhere.
items.text_de: . . . stiehlt zu Hause, in der Schule oder anderswo.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
items.description_de: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

items.text: . . . is constantly fidgeting or squirming.
items.text_de: . . . ist staendig zappelig.
items.description: Source: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
